Name: Patrón Señor Sling
Ingredients: 20 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and lightly stir.
Review: Created by Philip Bischoff, bar manager at Singapore’s Four Seasons multi-award winning Hotel Bar, Manhattan. Philip created this drink for Patrón Tequila as part of their activity for London Cocktail Week 2016.
Nutrition: One serving of Patrón Señor Sling contains 196 calories
Garnish: Dehydrated pineapple & lime slices with cherry
